_source.short_desc: Event management software for charitable fundraising. Online/Mobile Bidding, Live Auctions, Donations, Ticket Sales & more!
_source.long_desc: Simple, Affordable, Powerful software for in person, hybrid or virtual events.  Supports live auctions, paper or online/mobile silent auction bidding, custom ticketing, seating management, custom color branding, donation bundling with multiple high resolution photos, guest self-checkout, monetary donations, marketing communications, detailed reporting, sponsor recognition and more. Our best in class customer service is FREE via phone or email. We're here to help!
_source.pricing_details:
A free demo is available on request.
BidSheet PLUS: $449 annual subscription + 2% 
BidSheet PRO: $649 annual subscription + 2% 
Mobile PLUS: $749 annual subscription + 2% 
Mobile PRO: $899 annual subscription + 2%
_source.target_audience: Community Service Organizations, Schools, Churches, Non-Profit Organizations of all sizes, sports organizations, political organizations and anyone wanting to run a fundraising based event.

media.caption: Auction catalog! Displays your items in a clean, organized format, making it easy for your bidders to navigate and place their bids! Our new Custom Color Branding feature lets you create an online event that looks and feels like your brand.
Up to five high resolution images or videos per item allow you to effectively highlight each one and get your bidders engaged.

Accept monetary donations! Create a customizable page with your own images, videos and verbiage, as well as your donation button amounts. Watch your thermometer rise with each donation, and a virtual confetti drop helps celebrate when you reach your goal!
Custom tickets! Create a customized landing page with custom tickets that can include meal choices, tables, sponsorships, raffles and more!
Easy to use! A clean, organized home page allows you to navigate quickly and easily to all your bidder and administrative functions.

category_features.name: Absentee Bidding
category_features.definition: A tool that allows bidders to bid on an upcoming auction item prior to the beginning of the auction

category_features.name: Alerts/Notifications
category_features.definition: Alerts/notifications within the system

category_features.name: Bid Management
category_features.definition: Share bid details, archive bids, and create bid requests to assist in bid solicitation and quote comparison

category_features.name: Billing & Invoicing
category_features.definition: Create and manage monetary interactions between parties (ie. bills and invoices)

category_features.name: Buy Now Option
category_features.definition: In addition to the traditional bidding process in an auction, add the option for bidders to buy the item immediately

category_features.name: Inventory Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage the quantity of resources on hand to maintain proper supply

category_features.name: Live Auction
category_features.definition: An auction that takes place in real time in front of a group of bidders

category_features.name: Membership Management
category_features.definition: Database of members to track personal information of individuals and families

category_features.name: Online Auction
category_features.definition: Host, facilitate and manage a virtual auction online in which participants and members can buy, sell or bid items

category_features.name: Online Bidding
category_features.definition: Allows for auction participants and potential buyers to bid for items virtually from anywhere

category_features.name: Proxy Bidding
category_features.definition: Bidders set a maximum price they?d pay for an item and bids are placed in small increments until that price or until the item is sold

category_features.name: Reverse Bidding
category_features.definition: Sellers bid for the prices of which they are willing to sell their items

category_features.name: Silent Auction
category_features.definition: An auction in which bidders write down their bids on a sheet of paper

category_features.name: Watch List
category_features.definition: Allows participants to watch, see and track activity related to an item or bid

category_features.name: Website Management
category_features.definition: Website builder or integration with 3rd party site

category_features.name: Campaign Management
category_features.definition: Create a collection of marketing actions to complete specific goals

category_features.name: Donation Tracking
category_features.definition: Track and view detailed financial donation history made by contacts and members

category_features.name: Donor Management
category_features.definition: Track and maintain donor relationships throughout various stages/activities including contact information and previous outreach

category_features.name: Event Management
category_features.definition: Schedule and manage the logistics of activities and other gatherings

category_features.name: Gift Matching Management
category_features.definition: Ability to match gifts through the system

category_features.name: Mobile Giving
category_features.definition: Manage and track recurring gifts

category_features.name: Online Giving
category_features.definition: Outlet for members and visitors to submit donations electronically

category_features.name: Payment Processing
category_features.definition: Accept, record, and reconcile financial transactions

category_features.name: Pledge Management
category_features.definition: Track commitments to donate in the future

category_features.name: Receipt Management
category_features.definition: Upload, track, and submit receipts in a central database

category_features.name: Recurring Giving
category_features.definition: Manage and track recurring gifts

category_features.name: Badge Management
category_features.definition: Create, manage, and print wearable badges with attendee information

category_features.name: Budgeting/Forecasting
category_features.definition: Allocate expenses needed

category_features.name: Conferences/Conventions
category_features.definition: Software that specializes in conferences, conventions and trade-shows

category_features.name: Exhibit/Vendor Management
category_features.definition: Manage layout and location logistics such as catering and venues

category_features.name: Gamification
category_features.definition: Games or game-like elements to track progress and reward accomplishments

category_features.name: Room Block Management
category_features.definition: Book and manage event location

category_features.name: Social Promotion
category_features.definition: Market event via social media tools

category_features.name: Sponsorship Management
category_features.definition: Raise funds via sponsors and grants

category_features.name: Surveys & Feedback
category_features.definition: Gauge satisfaction and receive information for improvement and success

category_features.name: Ticketing
category_features.definition: Customize, sell, and distribute tickets

category_features.name: Volunteer Management
category_features.definition: Manage volunteer information and direct volunteer resources

related_products.short_desc: Thousands of small nonprofits rely on Network for Good's simple and smart fundraising software to cultivate relationships with donors a
related_products.features:
Reach your fundraising goals, connect with supporters, and advance your mission with Network for Good's all-in-one fundraising software.

Built for small and growing nonprofits, only Network for Good is designed to help you become a better fundraiser.

Get donor management, powerful communication tools, online fundraising features, and more-all in one integrated software. Plus, our best-in-class onboarding, customer service, and data migration are always included.

related_products.short_desc: Auctria: a budget friendly web solution to run your entire event from tickets to receipts; traditional auctions or online fundraisers.
related_products.features: Auctria makes live, silent, online, virutal, hybrid auction & event fundraisers easy & affordable for groups large and small. Handle ticket sales, bids, purchases & donations. Track donors & items.  Produce printed forms as needed. Integrated credit card processing optional & accept online donations. Mobile and text-based bidding available. Completely transparent pricing with no performance fees. Explore our demo or get started with a free account to try it out.

related_products.short_desc: Auction & Event Fundraising Software: Virtual & Streaming Events | Online Auctions & Donations | Mobile Bidding  | Event Mgmt.
related_products.features:
OneCause auction and event fundraising software offers an intuitive and affordable solution. Providing the ability to manage multiple virtual or live fundraising events annually allowing any-sized organization to connect more donors to your cause.

Software includes: auction item & package tracking | campaign management | streaming video | mobile bidding | online auctions & sales | ticketing & sponsorship | table seating | reporting & analytics | Text2Give | online, phone & email support.

related_products.short_desc: Web-based service designed to make it easier to manage a variety of fundraising events for schools and non-profits.
related_products.features:
Flexible fundraising software available for schools and non-profits. Organizations using SchoolAuction.net can use it to run in-person gala auctions, online auctions, virtual events with livestreaming video, or hybrid events with both in-person and remote bidders. Virtual events can be 1-screen, 2-screen, or Zoom-based. Hybrid events can use traditional or smartphone-based bidding.

Also supports: Pledge events ("-a-thons"), crowdfunding campaigns, text-to-give, online stores, and more.

related_products.short_desc: Inspire and engage donors with our smart, simple online fundraising, event and donor management tools with GiveSmart.
related_products.features:
GiveSmart is the easy-to-use, innovative, and modern online fundraising and donor management platform that elevates any fundraiser. From mobile-friendly silent auctions to dynamic peer-to-peer events and guest management to donor engagement, we're the solution to turn your mission into something that moves donors. 
We've helped thousands of nonprofits raise $5.3+ billion. Our full suite of solutions and expert support helps you exceed your fundraising, event, and donor management goals.

related_products.short_desc: Buy and sell tool which can be customized to Auction, Reverse Auction, Penny Auction, Silent Auction.
related_products.features: Buy and sell tools which can be customized to Auction, Reverse Auction, Penny Auction and Silent Auction. We are suited for individual business entrepreneurs , family business , multi million corporates and government entities to deploy auction,  buy it now , reverse , penny and silent online marketplaces. Our Software runs on Cloud & Dedicated Servers, also works well with 50+ payment gateways including Paypal, Authorize.net, Braintree payment, Balanced payment & Adaptive payments.

related_products.short_desc: Manage your entire nonprofit with a single CRM! Get all the functionality you need, plus donation webpages & build-in email marketing.
related_products.features:
Manage your entire nonprofit with a single CRM! Choose the Add-on options you need, including Memberships, Case Management, Grant Management and more to create a solution tailored for your exact needs.

Sumac also offers donation webpages, build-in  email marketing tools, and it integrates with your accounting software.

If you manage unique programs and services, Sumac has a Custom Add-on that we'll configure to meet your exact needs,

related_products.short_desc: High return, high touch event fundraising and charity auctions. A single platform for tickets, auction, donations, payments. Free demo.
related_products.features:
Organizations choose ClickBid over other providers because of our industry leading support. Each organization is given a dedicated account manager for the entire year. This ensures that your questions are answered consistently and intelligently.

Customers also enjoy a single platform for ticket sales, donations, auctions, broadcasting, fund-a-need, live auctions, mobile payments and integrations with CRMs.

Get a personal demo from our advisors to see how ClickBid is helping others like you.

related_products.short_desc: Auction Site Builder: Auto Bidding & Anti-Sniping. Start Auctioning in Only 5 Minutes. Use any Domain Name. All Languages Supported.
related_products.features:
Auction Site Builder: Create an Auction Site. Easy.Auction's solution supports Forward/English, Private and Reverse auctions. 

Easy to use interfaces, Auto bidding & Anti-sniping. Start today for only $49 per month. High-speed Hosting Included: all our US and European servers are 8-core LiteSpeed web servers.

No contracts, No cancellation fees. You can use any existing or new Domain Name you like. All Languages and Currencies are supported. Setup in Only 5 Minutes.

related_products.short_desc: Automate, track and manage your fundraising efforts from one platform. Streamline your event planning and fundraising efforts.
related_products.features: Simplify your fundraising process by switching to an all-in-one solution with updated technology and streamlined tools. Multiple payment and registration solutions streamline your event. Mobile-optimized websites, staff support, secure transactions and easy reporting get you the results you are looking for.

similar_products.short_desc: ZGIVE offers nonprofits simple, smart, event fundraising with an easy-to-use platform, AI/predictive analytics, and more!
similar_products.features:
ZGIVE is a charity event fundraising platform for in-person and virtual events. 

Features:
Unlimited items\Unlimited participants\Mobile & online bidding\Silent auction & live auction\Virtual, in-person, hybrid events\Nonprofit/auctioneer dashboard\Digital registration tools (QR code, text, link)\Buy it Now\Fund-a-Need\Donor opt-in to pay processing fees\Built-in SMS text messaging\Donate button\AI-Auction Intelligence Report\During-Auction Support

similar_products.short_desc: BetterWorld is an intuitive, cloud-based fundraising platform specializing in nonprofit online auctions.
similar_products.features: BetterWorld is an intuitive, cloud-based fundraising platform that helps nonprofits raise more money with less effort, all for free. The software offers features such as online auctions, giveaways, donations, crowdfunding, ticketing and impact giving. Nonprofits are provided with an intuitive, user-friendly platform that requires no training and have access to fast, friendly customer support.

similar_products.short_desc: Digital fundraising platform for auctions, raffles and direct donations. Ideal for onsite and online fundraisers, plus virtual galas.
similar_products.features: Digital fundraising platform supporting auctions, raffles and direct donations. Compatible with any mobile or desktop device, GalaBid is ideal for onsite fundraising events, online fundraisers and virtual galas and events. Online accessibility increases participation, while dynamic and interactive features encourages bidder activity and donations. The platform also provides a variety of options for sponsors to showcase their brand.

similar_products.short_desc: BidJS enables online timed and webcast bidding on your own website. Simple low cost pricing and quick and easy to set up.
similar_products.features: BidJS enables online timed and webcast bidding on your own website. Simple low cost pricing and quick and easy to set up. Fully real-time and works across multiple devices. Selling options include Buy Now, Make Offer and live webcast bidding. BidJS scales with you, from a few lots per month to thousands per week. Its also multilingual, allowing you to sell in any language. Most importantly BidJS is fully customisable and works with your own branding.

similar_products.short_desc: Automate, track and manage your fundraising efforts from one platform. Streamline your event planning and fundraising efforts.
similar_products.features: Simplify your fundraising process by switching to an all-in-one solution with updated technology and streamlined tools. Multiple payment and registration solutions streamline your event. Mobile-optimized websites, staff support, secure transactions and easy reporting get you the results you are looking for.

similar_products.short_desc: Timed Online Auction Platform with Mobile-friendly design and Proxy Bidding, Buy Now, Reserve, Fixed Price, and many more options.
similar_products.features:
AuctionWorx Enterprise is a ready built online auction platform optimized for mobile, tablets, and desktops.

Single Seller - List your own products - Replace or build on to existing sales channels with a fully configurable auction website.

Multiple Seller - Create a marketplace of multiple vendors - Allow 3rd party sellers to promote their listings and charge listing and final sale fees configurable to your business requirements.

Web-based Admin features powerful configuration options.

similar_products.short_desc: Inspire and engage donors with our smart, simple online fundraising, event and donor management tools with GiveSmart.
similar_products.features:
GiveSmart is the easy-to-use, innovative, and modern online fundraising and donor management platform that elevates any fundraiser. From mobile-friendly silent auctions to dynamic peer-to-peer events and guest management to donor engagement, we're the solution to turn your mission into something that moves donors. 
We've helped thousands of nonprofits raise $5.3+ billion. Our full suite of solutions and expert support helps you exceed your fundraising, event, and donor management goals.

similar_products.short_desc: A complete line of commercial auction software that is easily customizable by our programming staff.
similar_products.features: Complete line of auction software for any purpose. Our software packages offer a plethora of EASY-TO-USE features that allow you to run an online auction for your business. This includes online software for LIVE AUCTIONS, EBAY STYLE, FUNDRAISING or even PENNY AUCTIONS. We maintain a programming staff so we can easily customize our software to conform to any business model.  We have over 20 years of experience and are easy to reach by phone. Ask about our BLOCKCHAIN solutions.

similar_products.short_desc: Best-in-class auctions with unlimited events, items & bids! Host virtual, in-person or hybrid auctions with Text-to-Bid mobile bidding.
similar_products.features: Snowball'a nonprofit fundraising auction software gives you the freedom to create unlimited charity auctions throughout the year, with no limits on items, bids or bidders. Snowball Auctions are a memorable and effective way to connect with your supporters while fundraising. Text-to-Bid functionality empowers supporters to bid more frequently, whether they're in the same room or thousands of miles apart. And with no hidden fees in our fundraising platform, you'll make more money for your cause.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top eCommerce software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of eCommerce tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: eCommerce software enables businesses to conduct transactions for goods and services wholly or partially over the Internet. Typical features for eCommerce applications include: online shopping carts, flexible product category structure and search, customer account and login tools, automatic customer notifications, tax administration, order tracking and print catalog support. eCommerce solutions often provide integration tools for call center support, inventory control, customer relationship management, and payment processing. eCommerce software is related to Order Entry software and Order Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Fundraising software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Fundraising tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Fundraising software manages donor and pledge information associated with fundraising campaigns. Development professionals use Fundraising applications to enhance their ability to locate, manage and grow donor sources. Fundraising software facilitates cost effective targeting of likely donors, tracks pledges, and manages contributions and donor relationship management. These applications also provide a variety of tools allowing fundraisers to track the effectiveness of their development campaigns. Fundraising software is related to Church Management software, Event Management software and Political Campaign software.
